title: New: Jamie Isaac – An Aus Trail – (The Iron Horse Dream)
body:
Still only seventeen years old, **Jamie Isaac’s** music embodies maturity and elegance far beyond his modest years, managing to manipulate the silences and swells of instrumentation into sheer euphoria.

Newest track _An Aus Trail – (The Iron Horse Dream)_, is a tender affair, pirouetting with the sort of transcendental desire that **How To Dress Well** nails every time.

_“small lips line this room with a sense of loss”_
